PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02402024-03-25NRCAN
ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
PrecisReappointment of FRANÇOIS TANGUAY of Montréal, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, on a part-time basis, effective May 11, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of FRANÇOIS TANGUAY of Montréal, Quebec, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Energy Regulator, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, on a part-time basis, effective May 11, 2024.
